text:
@chrislhayes @gtconway3d The coronavirus is obviously a liberal because people talking about it keep saying mean things about Trump.

And why do people keep expecting Trump to solve our problems? He didn't want to be president to solve problems, he just wants to be constantly praised for doing so.
